qas.question: Who is known for unifying the Tibetan heartland?
What did the 5th Dalai Lama and his intimates establish?
What is the Tibetan goverment referred to as?
Who is known for unifying the Tibetan heartland under the control of Kagyu?
What was the Gelug prince defeated after?
What was Gushi Oirat the leader of?
What civil administration did Gushi Khan establish?

context: <b4_0>The <a0_0>5th Dalai Lama<b4_0/><a0_0/> is known for unifying the Tibetan heartland under the control of the Gelug school of Tibetan Buddhism, after defeating the rival Kagyu and Jonang sects and the secular ruler, the Tsangpa prince, in <b5_0>a prolonged civil war<b5_0/>. His efforts were successful in part because of aid from <a1_0>Güshi Khan<a1_0/>, the Oirat leader of <b6_0>the Khoshut Khanate<b6_0/>. With Güshi Khan as a largely uninvolved overlord, the 5th Dalai Lama and his intimates established a civil administration which is referred to by historians as the <a2_0><b7_0>Lhasa state<b7_0/><a2_0/>. This Tibetan regime or government is also referred to as the <a3_0>Ganden Phodrang<a3_0/>.
